Posts.Content: Anyone else have breast cancer spread to the skin, and what treatments are available.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Stage IV to the Skin

Posts.Content: On Mar 22, 2010 4:02 AM dl942care9 wrote: I am worried about a dark spot I have near my sternum. [right Breast cancer 12/08; proph left mastectomy 3/10] How did they find it?  Sorry for  your diagnosis. A small tumor grew along my incision after my mastectomy and from there it broke out on my skin when the mastectomy had taken place, it was little red marks that looked like little pimples.  That was 2 years ago, had radiation and different kinds of chemo for the past year but nothing really getting rid of it.  It is very burny and itchy.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Stage IV to the Skin

Posts.Content: Yes I am currently on doxil, have had 2 treatments.  I have breast cancer metastasied to the skin.
Posts.Title: doxil
